functional_fitness.heading: What is Functional Fitness?
functional_fitness.body: Functional fitness focuses on exercises that train your muscles to work together, simulating movements you do in everyday life. Think squats, carries, presses, and pulls â€” patterns your body was designed for.
functional_fitness.body_2: Rather than isolating individual muscles for the sake of aesthetics, functional training builds real-world strength, improves mobility, and reduces the risk of injury. It's training with a purpose â€” and it's the foundation of everything I do.
